name: OKTOGONE MELEE
description:
Play as your favorite rappers [/ b] in a frenzied fight to get back the masters of your music.

Chain fights in the metro or your old record company with the possibility of playing 6 different rappers. Find out how, leaving a metro station already filled with guards, your rapper will find himself facing the record label boss in his office.

Jump between three different combat chapters instantly, and piss off a whole bunch of guards obeying only the orders of the boss of the record company. The combat takes on a new dimension thanks to numerous combo and fatality animations to discover in the game.
